name: Lost In The Space
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2622240/Shadow_Strikers/
Los In The Space is a game that will push your skills to the limit, with frantic combat at all times, it offers you a variety of stages, with several waves of enemies.
After a space trip gone wrong, Jhon and Vanessa end up lost on a distant, unknown and unexplored planet, having to face several waves of enemies so they can make it back home.

In this adventure, you will face more than 100 waves of enemies and several bosses along the way.
With a difficulty that increases as you proceed, bringing new enemies, faster, more resistant and with a better intelligence that will leave you cornered and with no way out at different moments of the game, but offering a great replay factor that will make you learn with each defeat and wanting to improve and be better than the last time.
Join them on this adventure and enjoy all the unstoppable action that only the most skilled can overcome.
